text: Va [muşrikon] ʙo saxttarin savgandhojaşon ʙa Alloh taolo savgand xūrdand, ki agar mu'çizae [ki xostaand] ʙar eşon ʙiojad, hatman, imon meovarand. [Ej pajomʙar] Bigū: «Mu'çizot faqat dar ixtijori Alloh taolo ast»va şumo [ej mu'minon] ci medoned, ki agar [mu'çizae ham] ʙijojad, imon nameovarand
